item.description:
To RSVP, please call Grezzo 857.362.7288. Please ask to be seated with Meetup, introduce yourself to the group, and enjoy! Thank you!

Renowned chef and author, Alissa Cohen, opened Boston's premier gourmet live cuisine restaurant, Grezzo, in February 2008 and the food is delicious! Grezzo Restaurant is "...committed to bringing you flawlessly fresh food with its lifeforce still intact. The concept is green, organic and locally-grown vegan, raw food served in an upscale style and setting." The menu will change daily.

Grezzo is conveniently located in the North End of Boston close to a parking garage and subway stops.

You can learn more at www.GrezzoRestaurant.com



You can order Alissa's book and/or DVD here
http://www.alissacohe...

------------------------
For Boston Raw Food Group posted files, please check the files section
www.meetup.com/RawBoston/files

To promote the BRFG, please print out and post our tear-strip flyer
files.meetup.com/733136/TearOffFlyer.pdf

For upcoming events, please check the calendar
www.meetup.com/RawBoston/calendar

For more information, please check the message board
www.meetup.com/RawBoston/messages/boards

For other raw events around New England, please visit
www.rawnewenglandcommunity.com

Posted by Martha Muehe (www.essenic.org)
item.how_to_find_us: Please ask to be seated with Meetup, introduce yourself to group, and enjoy! :)
item.name: Grezzo Restaurant
